Code Hide / Show nội dung Ver1

Bản Quyền : ChipTeam - Byn.Pro ( ChipTeam.EaZy.Vn )

Demo : [ Đang UpdaTe]

Bbcode :

<code>
    [sp={TEXT}]{TEXT1}[/sp]
</code>

<code>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
      $("#sptd").click(function(){
        $("#spnd").slideToggle(500);
      });
      });
    </script>
    <div id="sptd">{TEXT} [Click Vào]</div>
    <div id="spnd">{TEXT1}</div>
</code>


Css :

<code>
    #spnd,#sptd
    {
    padding:5px;
    text-align:left;
    background-color:#e5eecc;
    border:solid 1px #c3c3c3;
    }
    #spnd
    {
    padding:10px;
    display:none;
    border-top: none;
    }

</code>
